short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: We help you make the sustainable choice your go-to!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
The easiest way to shop second-hand online. The Faircado extension automatically searches the internet and displays the best second-hand treasures whilst you shop as normal. It's magic!

By joining our community you save money, time and CO2 with every purchase!

üöÄ Quick and Effortless Setup

Add Faircado to your browser within seconds. Shop as you usually do and let us do the money-saving magic.

üß≥ Millions of Sustainable Choices Across Categories

With a single click, Faircado scans your shopping choices and suggests cheaper, second-hand options. From books and fashion to electronics, get the best sustainable deals from trusted sites.

üåç Proudly Serving Global Shoppers

Whether you‚Äôre into e-commerce, looking for shopping gems, Faircado has got you covered. We have over 50+ partners from around the world across books, fashion and electronics.

üå± Why Choose Faircado?

Sustainability meets savings: Discover environmentally-friendly alternatives that are also gentle on your wallet.

Daily Updates: We‚Äôre tirelessly adding new products, categories, and partners to make Faircado better. Every day brings more choices!

We value your feedback: Got a suggestion, feedback, or just some love to share? Let us know at contact@faircado.com.

Disclaimer: Faircado uses an affiliate model, meaning the links you click on a product listing are affiliated. Our affiliated platforms pay us when we direct you to a second-hand listing on their site. We believe this incentivises us to help you find what you‚Äôre looking for, and we think that‚Äôs worth something!
